title: Saturn Transit in the 6th House: Mastery Through Discipline
summary: When Saturn transits the 6th house for a Capricorn Ascendant, daily work, health, and responsibilities demand strict discipline. Challenges increase, but so does your ability to handle pressure with maturity. Enemies, debts, or obstacles are overcome slowly through persistence rather than force. This transit strengthens endurance, work ethics, and problem-solving skills. Saturn here teaches that true victory comes from consistency, self-control, and facing difficulties without avoidance.

sections.title: Career
points: Success in service or compliance roles

sections.title: Finance
points: Expenses linked to health or routines

closing: Saturn in the 6th house proves that discipline and persistence turn challenges into lasting strength.
